title: Mashed potatoes and celeriac
ingredients: ['1.25kg potatoes, peeled and cut into 2cm cubes', '1 large celeriac, peeled and cut into 2cm cubes', '3 cloves garlic, peeled', '120ml almond milk, divided', '4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, divided', '2 tablespoons minced fresh chives', '1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste', 'freshly ground black pepper to taste']
